The Live Game Night website (www.livegamenight.com, the "Site") and the Live Game Night game or app (the "Game") are owned and operated by FlowPlay, Inc. ("FlowPlay", "we," "us").
When you play our games, we record your gameplay statistics and add this information to your profile, which can be viewed by other players.

We will, however, share personal information provided or obtained through LGN with third parties as follows: Upon request we will provide you with information about whether we hold, or process on behalf of a third party, any personal information about you.
